product_name: Mammut Ride Protection Avalanche Airbag 22 Pack
long_description: The Ride Protection Airbag 22 Pack is the perfect crossover size for backcountry day trips as well as lift-accessed backcountry, and it adds a margin of safety with the Protection Airbag System.
